subject: Lorem Ipsum CEO
body:
Hi {{user.firstName}},

I hope all’s going well. This is just a quick one to let you know that we are looking for “volunteers” to help prepare some new content for Seminar in two weeks.. I know you’ve got plenty of other things going on at the moment but your help would be really appreciated.

**Let me know if you are interested!**

Hopefully we can get a coffee afterwards.

Best,
Lorem

*Dr. Lorem Ipsum
CEO*
